stdObsHdrs¶

gempy.instruments.geminiTools.stdObsHdrs(ad)[source]¶

This function is used by standardizeHeaders in primitives_GEMINI.

It will update the PHU header keys NSCIEXT, PIXSCALE NEXTEND, OBSMODE, COADDEXP, EXPTIME and NCOADD plus it will add a time stamp for GPREPARE to indicate that the file has be prepared.

In the SCI extensions the header keys GAIN, PIXSCALE, RDNOISE, BUNIT, NONLINEA, SATLEVEL and EXPTIME will be updated.

Parameters:ad (an AstroData instance) – astrodata instance to perform header key updates on

secStrToIntList

Next topic

stdObsStruct
